set.name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Faceless One is your commander, choose a color before the game begins. Faceless One is the chosen color. Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Abdel Adrian, Gorion's Ward enters the battlefield, exile any number of other nonland permanents you control until Abdel Adrian leaves the battlefield. Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token for each permanent exiled this way. Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Ancient Gold Dragon deals combat damage to a player, roll a d20. You create a number of 1/1 blue Faerie Dragon creature tokens with flying equal to the result.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Whenever an opponent searches their library, you gain 1 life and draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Knowledge is the greatest tool of the mortal mind, outweighing anything made by mortal hands. Before anything else can exist, the idea must exist."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return all creature and planeswalker cards with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Exile Ascend from Avernus.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Smoke clogged the streets and rubble littered the ground, but sunlight shining on the long-lost towers of Elturel was still a beautiful sight.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each opponent you're attacking. Exile target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "After voyaging all the way through the Astral Sea with my life hanging by a silver thread, fighting the mind flayer was the easy part."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Wind Walk - {8}: Up to two target creatures each get +2/+2 and gain flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Lord of Darkness elevates only those who serve."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Banishment enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls and all other nonland permanents your opponents control with the same name as that permanent until Banishment leaves the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, myriad Whenever Battle Angels of Tyr deals combat damage to a player, draw a card if that player has more cards in hand than each other player. Then you create a Treasure token if that player controls more lands than each other player. Then you gain 3 life if that player has more life than each other player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Lure the Unwary - At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose an opponent. Creatures attacking the last chosen player get +1/+0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Follow the light at your own risk.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Flying Whenever Blessed Hippogriff attacks, target attacking creature without flying gains flying until end of turn. //
Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature, then roll a d20. 1-9 | Its controller creates a 4/4 green Ox creature token. 10-19 | Its controller creates a 2/2 green Boar creature token. 20 | Its controller creates a 0/1 white Goat creature token.

property.name: Rules
Flavor
property.value: "Wait, it was just guarding a bunch of eggs! Where is the treasure?" - Xalcorin the bard // "Wait, it was just guarding a bunch of eggs! Where is the treasure?" - Xalcorin the bard

property.name: Artist
Rules
property.value: Each opponent draws a card, then you draw a card for each opponent who drew a card this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's a win-win arrangement. I just happen to win the most." - Duke Thalamra Vanthampur

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Dawnbringer Cleric enters the battlefield, choose one - • Cure Wounds - You gain 2 life. • Dispel Magic - Destroy target enchantment. • Gentle Repose - Exile target card from a graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of tokens you created this turn. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have "At the beginning of your end step, exile up to one target tapped creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You have traveled to many places, over mountains and across seas, but a new journey always calls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever this creature attacks, it gains double strike until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You carry the security of Baldur's Gate on your shoulders, and you welcome the weight of responsibility.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature you control leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Flaming Fist Officer.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Get the remaining citizens to safety! These miscreants have an appointment with my spear."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Flying Psychic Defense - When Githzerai Monk enters the battlefield, tap all creatures you don't control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The githzerai dwell in the heart of Limbo, shaping the chaos of that plane with their powerful psionic abilities.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You can't enter this dungeon unless you "venture into Undercity." Secret Entrance - Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. (Forge, Lost Well) Forge - Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. (Trap, Arena) Lost Well - Scry 2. (Arena, Stash) Trap - Target player loses 5 life. (Archives) Arena - Goad target creature. (Archives, Catacombs) Stash - Create a Treasure token. (Catacombs) Archives - Draw a card. (Throne of the Dead Three) Catacombs - Create a 4/1 black Skeleton creature token with menace. (Throne of the Dead Three) Throne of the Dead Three - Reveal the top ten cards of your library. Put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. It gains hexproof until your next turn. Then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance When Goliath Paladin enters the battlefield, you take the initiative.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why do you cower in the darkness, little gnolls? If you would challenge me, step into the light."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever equipped creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it and tap up to one target creature defending player controls. Equip {W} ({W}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the light of its gleaming blade, the faithful shine and the wicked cower.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance As long as it's your turn, prevent all damage that would be dealt to Guardian Naga.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

property.value: Myriad (Whenever this creature attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of this creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.) Whenever Hammers of Moradin attacks, for each opponent, tap up to one target creature that player controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have "Creature tokens you control get +2/+2."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Your family needed a farmer, so you tilled. Your town needed a fighter, so you trained. When your people needed a leader, you knew what you had to do.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you would put one or more counters on a creature or planeswalker you control or on yourself, put that many plus one of each of those kinds of counters on that permanent or player instead. Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile all nontoken creatures you control, then roll a d20. 1-9 | Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. 10-20 | Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control, then exile them again. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have myriad. (Whenever a creature with myriad attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of that creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on each tapped creature you control, then untap them. Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and is goaded. (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.) Whenever enchanted creature attacks, each other creature that's attacking one of your opponents gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant nonland permanent Enchanted permanent is a Treasure artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color," and it loses all other abilities. (If it was a creature, it's no longer a creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have "When this creature enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, each player may put two +1/+1 counters on a creature they control. For each opponent who does, you gain protection from that player until your next turn." (You can't be targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything controlled by that player.)

property.name: Rules
property.value:

Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power. Whenever Rasaad yn Bashir attacks, if you have the initiative, double the toughness of each creature you control until end of turn. Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Roll a d20. 1-9 | Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. 10-19 | Create two 2/2 white Knight creature tokens. 20 | Create three 2/2 white Knight creature tokens.

property.value: The Harpers value peaceful coexistence, historical preservation, and harmony with nature, and each day they spread their ideals a little farther.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target spell, then roll a d20 and add that spell's mana value. 1-14 | You may cast the exiled card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell. 15+ | You may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost for as long as it remains exiled.

property.value: "Filthy, sticky, vile, noxious - and I haven't even started describing the webs." - Erinis, gloom stalker // "Filthy, sticky, vile, noxious - and I haven't even started describing the webs." - Erinis, gloom stalker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to two basic land cards and/or Gate cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. You take the initiative.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Careful near those pretty glowing plants. What do you think they feed on?" - Talin, Underdark guide

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.) Other creatures you control have trample and ward {2}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: Until end of turn, target token you control becomes a green Bear creature with base power and toughness 4/4 in addition to its other colors and types. Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever this creature attacks a player, if no opponent has more life than that player, another target creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is this creature's power."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You're a born explorer, happiest forging your way through the untamed wilds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {G}. When you spend this mana to cast a Dragon creature spell, it enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it and gains hexproof until your next turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tokens you control have "{T}: Add {G}." Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Harpers' movement grows, but it needs sunlight to blossom. We can be that light."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to X basic land cards, where X is the number of creatures attacking you, put those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Lurking Green Dragon can't attack unless defending player controls a creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Territorial. Scary. No further notes." - Volo's field notes

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top X cards of your library, where X is the greatest mana value of a commander you own on the battlefield or in the command zone. You may put any number of permanent cards from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have "This creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it" and "Other creatures you control enter the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on them."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You never thought "rations" was an appropriate term for the feasts that you prepare for your party.

property.name: Rules
Flavor
Rules
property.value: Infesting Spores - When Myconid Spore Tender enters the battlefield, destroy up to one target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Myconid colonies grow and expand at an aggressive rate, but they are friendly and peaceful unless provoked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Druidcraft is a simple invocation to spirits of nature, promising a glimpse of nature's secrets.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control gain vigilance and trample until end of turn. Roll a d20. 1-9 | Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn. 10-19 | Put two +1/+1 counters on each creature you control. 20 | Put four +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mama's Coming - Whenever Owlbear Cub attacks a player who controls eight or more lands, look at the top eight cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield tapped and attacking that player. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your end step, if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When your pack is nowhere to be found, you form a new one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Breath of basilisk, sting of scorpion, or medusa's tears? All may be distilled, for a price."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3, must be blocked if able, and is goaded. (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have base power and toughness 10/10 and are Giants in addition to their other types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Your parents taught you that strength can be nurtured and honed, no matter one's size.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +3/+3 and can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or less. Equip {3}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ". . . and I will need an equally righteous but slightly smaller saddle for my space hamster companion." - Minsc, beloved ranger

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {G}. When you spend this mana to cast a Dragon creature spell, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life always starts small. Only time will tell what heights it may reach."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach Sharpshooter Elf's power is equal to the number of creatures you control. When Sharpshooter Elf enters the battlefield, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature with flying an opponent controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Conjure Elemental - {8}: Untap target land you control. It becomes an 8/8 Elemental creature with trample and haste until end of turn. It's still a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Arise, friend, and seize the horizon in the name of the Oak Father."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Skanos Dragonheart attacks, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the greatest power among other Dragons you control and Dragon cards in your graveyard. Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch When Skullwinder enters the battlefield, return target card from your graveyard to your hand, then choose an opponent. That player returns a card from their graveyard to their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile up to five target permanent cards from your graveyard and separate them into two piles. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Put that pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard. (Piles can be empty.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That half is yours. These halves are mine."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to X basic land cards, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control. Put those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "By the time you've seen it all, all have already changed." - Wandering treant, name unknown

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Undercellar Myconid enters the battlefield or dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Water, barley, yeast, darkness - the tavern cellar had everything a growing mold could need.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance When Undermountain Adventurer enters the battlefield, you take the initiative. {T}: Add {G}{G}. If you've completed a dungeon, add six {G} instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Vigilance, reach, trample Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.) Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Run and Hide - Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to you and creatures you control this turn. • Gather Your Courage - Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains indestructible until end of turn. All creatures your opponents control able to block that creature this turn do so.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Form a Party - Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal any number of creature cards from among them and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. • Start a Brawl - Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Draw a card, then exile a card from your hand and put a number of time counters on it equal to its mana value. It gains "When the last time counter is removed from this card, if it's exiled, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. If you cast a creature spell this way, it gains haste until end of turn." Then remove a time counter from each other card you own in exile.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch, lifelink At the beginning of your end step, choose one - • Feed - Target opponent loses life equal to the amount of life they lost this turn. • Friends - You gain life equal to the amount of life you gained this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice up to three permanents: If there were three or more card types among the sacrificed permanents, each opponent loses 3 life, you gain 3 life, and you draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Better the cold night than her warm hospitality.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as your life total is less than or equal to half your starting life total, Bane, Lord of Darkness has indestructible. Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, target opponent may have you draw a card. If they don't, you may put a creature card with equal or lesser toughness from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as your life total is less than or equal to half your starting life total, Bhaal, Lord of Murder has indestructible. Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature and goad it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Cadira, Caller of the Small deals combat damage to a player, for each token you control, create a 1/1 white Rabbit creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She roams the border between wilderness and civilization, protecting those who need it most.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you attack, spells you cast from exile this turn cost {X} less to cast, where X is the number of players being attacked. Exile the top X cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among those exiled cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's a ghoul-eat-you world out there. Follow my orders if you want to survive."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player draws their second card during their turn, you draw a card. Whenever a player casts their second spell during their turn, you create a 2/2 white Knight creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ambition has a price in Baldur's Gate, and it is paid to the Council.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of combat on your turn, another target creature you control gains haste and myriad until end of turn. (Whenever it attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of that creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste You may activate abilities of other creatures you control as though those creatures had haste. {T}: When you next activate an ability that isn't a mana ability this turn by spending four or more mana to activate it, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you scry, the next instant or sorcery spell you cast this turn costs {X} less to cast, where X is the number of cards looked at while scrying this way. [+2]: Draw a card, then scry 2. −3: Exile the top card of your library. Create a number of 1/1 blue Faerie Dragon creature tokens with flying equal to that card's mana value. Elminster can be your commander.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your end step, choose a player. They put two +1/+1 counters on a creature they control. Choose a second player to draw a card. Then choose a third player to create two Treasure tokens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Whenever you cast an Adventure spell, you may copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You are safest in Candlekeep, Abdel, but I cannot keep you from the world forever."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste {T}, Sacrifice an artifact creature: Create two Treasure tokens. {T}, Sacrifice a noncreature artifact: Create two 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature tokens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your end step, target opponent gains control of up to one target creature you control. Put two +1/+1 counters on it and tap it. It's goaded for the rest of the game and it gains "This creature can't be sacrificed." (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.) Whenever a creature you own but don't control attacks, you draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Kagha, Shadow Archdruid attacks, it gains deathtouch until end of turn. Mill two cards. (Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.) Once during each of your turns, you may play a land or cast a permanent spell from among cards in your graveyard that were put there from your library this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may look at the top card of your library any time. You may cast Dragon spells from the top of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Would you like a song of wing-wind and fire, or one of gentle heartbeats atop a golden hoard?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast an Adventure or Dragon spell, Lozhan, Dragons' Legacy deals damage equal to that spell's mana value to any target that isn't a commander.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She channels myth and memory into waves of deadly arcane force.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your end step, create a Treasure token for each creature that died this turn. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Welcome to the Wandering Emporium. Feel free to browse the bazaar. We have everything a lost soul could want, need, or afford."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an enchanted creature attacks one of your opponents, it gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn. Whenever an Aura you control is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, exile it. Until the end of your next turn, you may cast that card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, ward {2} Whenever another nontoken Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, create a token that's a copy of it, except the token isn't legendary.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Minsc + Boo, Timeless Heroes enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, you may create Boo, a legendary 1/1 red Hamster creature token with trample and haste. [+1]: Put three +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature with trample or haste. −2: Sacrifice a creature. When you do, Minsc + Boo, Timeless Heroes deals X damage to any target, where X is that creature's power. If the sacrificed creature was a Hamster, draw X cards. Minsc + Boo, Timeless Heroes can be your commander.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ward {X}, where X is the number of experience counters you have. At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, you get an experience counter. Creatures you control get +1/+0 for each experience counter you have.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as your life total is less than or equal to half your starting life total, Myrkul, Lord of Bones has indestructible. Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, you may exile it. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's an enchantment and loses all other card types.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a spell, you may put it on the bottom of its owner's library. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then put all revealed cards not cast this way on the bottom of your library in a random order. This ability triggers only once each turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace Ward - Pay 9 life. Whenever Nine-Fingers Keene deals combat damage to a player, look at the top nine cards of your library. You may put a Gate card from among them onto the battlefield. Then if you control nine or more Gates, put the rest into your hand. Otherwise, put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Oji, the Exquisite Blade enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life and scry 2. Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, exile up to one target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They walk the Path of the Kensei with perfect balance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature you control with a mana ability gets +2/+2. Whenever a creature you control with a mana ability attacks, untap it. Whenever you cast a spell, if at least seven mana was spent to cast it, untap target creature. It gets +7/+7 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Other Demons, Devils, Imps, and Tieflings you control get +1/+1 and have lifelink. At the beginning of each end step, if a creature card was put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, create a 1/1 red Devil creature token with "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch When Rilsa Rael, Kingpin enters the battlefield, you take the initiative. Whenever you attack, target attacking creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. If you've completed a dungeon, that creature also gets +5/+0 and gains first strike and menace until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a spell you don't own, create a 3/3 black Demon creature token. [+1]: Draw a card. For each opponent, exile up to one target instant or sorcery card from that player's graveyard and put a page counter on it. −3: You may cast a spell from among cards in exile with page counters on them without paying its mana cost. Tasha, the Witch Queen can be your commander.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Thrakkus the Butcher attacks, double the power of each Dragon you control until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Somehow, he never seems to run out of fresh meat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste {2}, {T}: When you next cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets only a single opponent or a single permanent an opponent controls this turn, for each other opponent, choose that player or a permanent they control, copy that spell, and the copy targets the chosen player or permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A quill from the First Reader at Candlekeep, the spectacles of the Most Holy Servant of Gond, a woven bookmark from the Caleph Arcane of Calimport: readers always leave something of themselves behind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To feel no constraint but the four points of a compass, to tread a path that only you can find . . . these are the flavors of power I've learned to savor." - Keon, horizon walker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard. {2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. {4}, {T}, Sacrifice Bag of Holding: Return all cards exiled with Bag of Holding to their owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has deathtouch and lifelink. Equip {2}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some patriars pay massive sums for exotic pets that can give their posh, predictable lives an edge of danger.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has myriad. (Whenever it attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of that creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.) Equip {4}

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Bronze Walrus enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.) {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, Sacrifice Burnished Hart: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not born of nature, but deeply connected to it nonetheless.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: You gain 2 life. {2}, {T}, Exile Campfire: Put all commanders you own from the command zone and from your graveyard into your hand. Then shuffle your graveyard into your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Charcoal Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every facet a portent of Kelemvor's inevitable judgment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: First discovered in ancient Netheril, chardalyn stones absorb and hold magical energy, enabling constructs to be infused with fearsome power and unnatural malice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has flying and haste. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How about the power of silent flight? Does that suit your needs, cutthroat?" - Rivalen Blackhand, proprietor of Sorcerous Sundries

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Clockwork Fox leaves the battlefield, you draw two cards and each opponent draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It might just be my greatest invention yet: a lovable pet that decreases the need for chores!" - Jan Jansen

property.name: Rules
property.value: You have no maximum hand size. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Now, remember: Under no circumstances should you utter the word ‘geyser' in the same room as - oh, blast it!" - Bindlehaim, Upper City merchant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash {T}, Sacrifice Dire Mimic: Add one mana of any color. {3}: Dire Mimic becomes a Shapeshifter artifact creature with base power and toughness 5/5 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes the closet is the monster.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Drillworks Mole and a +1/+1 counter on up to one target commander creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Flaming Fist soldiers prepared to face a bulette, or worse, but the cause of the rumblings turned out to be much more benign and bizarre.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dungeoneer's Pack enters the battlefield tapped. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Dungeoneer's Pack: You take the initiative, gain 3 life, draw a card, and create a Treasure token. Activate only as a sorcery. (A Treasure token is an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fire Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every facet aglow like iron in Moradin's mighty forge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Fraying Line enters the battlefield, put a rope counter on target creature you control. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may pay {2}. If they do, they put a rope counter on a creature they control. Otherwise, exile Fraying Line and each creature without a rope counter on it, then remove all rope counters from all creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Gate you control. Gate Colossus can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less. Whenever a Gate enters the battlefield under your control, you may put Gate Colossus from your graveyard on top of your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Geode Golem deals combat damage to a player, you may cast your commander from the command zone without paying its mana cost. (You still pay any additional costs.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Iron Mastiff attacks, roll a d20 for each player being attacked and ignore all but the highest roll. 1-9 | Iron Mastiff deals damage equal to its power to you. 10-19 | Iron Mastiff deals damage equal to its power to defending player. 20 | Iron Mastiff deals damage equal to its power to each opponent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color. {4}, {T}: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped. If you don't put the card onto the battlefield, you may put it on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: Untap another target artifact. {3}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Finally! It was worth the price to never have to fiddle with lockpicks ever again." - Davvry Mineshadow, thief

property.name: Rules
property.value: Marble Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every facet a benediction of Lathander's light.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Marching Duodrone attacks, each player creates a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Marut enters the battlefield, if mana from a Treasure was spent to cast it, create a Treasure token for each mana from a Treasure spent to cast it. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Meteor Golem enters the battlefield, destroy target nonland permanent an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The strongest golems are forged from meteoric iron that has been tempered in the heat of an elemental plane.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Ward - Discard a card. Whenever Mighty Servant of Leuk-o becomes crewed for the first time each turn, if it was crewed by exactly two creatures, it gains "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw two cards" until end of turn. Crew 4

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't study it because I want answers; I study it because there is beauty in pursuing the unknown." - Misvaad, Candlekeep librarian

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, if it was cast, exile it, then return all other permanent cards exiled with Mirror of Life Trapping to the battlefield under their owners' control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Quenton barely had a second to admire his exquisite handsomeness before reality collapsed around him.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Moss Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every facet a promise of Chauntea's bounty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Nautiloid Ship enters the battlefield, exile target player's graveyard. Whenever Nautiloid Ship deals combat damage to a player, you may put a creature card exiled with Nautiloid Ship onto the battlefield under your control. Crew 3

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Navigation Orb: Search your library for up to two basic land cards and/or Gate cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Travel the world without ever leaving the comfort of home.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Nimblewright Schematic enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "While it is certainly a unique touch, Jan, does the mustache really need to be there?" - High Artificer Andar Beech

property.name: Rules
property.value: Noble's Purse enters the battlefield tapped and with three coin counters on it. {T}, Remove a coin counter from Noble's Purse: Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color. {1}, {T}: Untap target legendary creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only a fool ignores a letter bearing the official mark of a patriar family.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Pilgrim's Eye enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Charting the Spine of the World is best left to the disposable.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Prized Statue enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the cultists, the sacred idol was priceless. To the adventurers, it was worth about two sturdy mules and a barrel of ale.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Prophetic Prism enters the battlefield, draw a card. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To understand Baldur's Gate, one must first understand how wealth and commerce shape every facet of life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a player casts a spell, they lose 1 life for each spell they've cast this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No, not an accessory to murder - I'm looking for an accessory for murder." - Nadja, Flaming Fist investigator

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sky Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}.

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You've heard rumors of bandits along the Coast Way, but your journey so far has been surprisingly uneventful.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lady Bormul claims an owlbear has been trampling her fields, but there's something unnatural about the tracks it left behind.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After spending all day trying to track down a rare tome, you're about to give up when you hear your name whispered from a dark alley.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You arrive at Baldur's Gate with instructions to head straight to the heart of the rumor mill: the bakery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As you sail past the imposing Seatower of Balduran, you realize that breaking your friend out of that prison will be much harder than you thought.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As you gaze down upon Wyrm's Crossing, you hear distant cries of alarm, and you notice that all traffic on the bridge has come to a halt.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You're about to disembark to find the harbormaster when you spot a merfolk darting underneath your ship.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ship's captain promised she'd get you safely to the Netherese ruin, but she is the one who just washed overboard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Now that you've clearly hit the "marsh" part of Lizard Marsh, you begin to worry about the "lizard" part.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sudden sinkhole was surprising enough, but nothing could have prepared you for the ancient city that was hidden underneath.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The old wizard's experiments destroyed the castle centuries ago. So why does some of the rubble look recent?

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At the mouth of the sewer pipe, you realize it's massive enough that even a giant could walk through without stooping. That gives you an idea . . .

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As you explore the slums of the Outer City, you keep hearing rumors of a den of werewolves in the caves below Dusthawk Hill.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lord Jannath sent you to secure the mine from gnoll raiders, but so far you haven't seen any gnolls . . . or, for that matter, any miners.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rumor holds that powerful artifacts and untold wealth are hidden away in Ramazith's Tower, and today you plan to find out for yourself.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As you pause mid-climb to catch your breath, you'd swear you can hear a heartbeat pulsing deep within the mountain.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You know that hiexel bark produces a lot of smoke when burned, but why would Rilsa Rael need so much of it?

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The lights in the cavern glow and fade, glow and fade in a rhythm that must have a deeper meaning, if only you can figure it out.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You continue to mutter and complain as you trip over yet another gnarled root. From behind the nearest tree trunk, something mutters back.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You're on your way home when you spot the gates of a strange city . . . one that isn't on the map and wasn't here when you traveled this path four days ago.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Whenever an opponent searches their library, you gain 1 life and draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a creature you control, then each opponent chooses a creature they control with equal or lesser power. If you chose a creature this way, exile each creature not chosen by any player this way.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules

You may cast up to X instant and/or sorcery spells from among cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs. 1-9 | X is one. 10-19 | X is two. 20 | X is three.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace Whenever Elder Brain attacks a player, exile all cards from that player's hand, then they draw that many cards. You may play lands and cast spells from among the exiled cards for as long as they remain exiled. If you cast a spell this way, you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast it.
